text.content:
Breathless

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued}.

Bludgeoning

Spun Around

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the end of its next turn.

Piercing

Sliced Hand

Normal damage. Until healed, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}, and can't used one of its hands (determined randomly by the GM).

Slashing

Combustion

If this is a fire bomb or spell, the target takes triple damage and @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Fire1d6.success]. Any other bomb or spell deals double damage.

Bomb or Spell
